Uses of Interface
com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSegmentMetaData

  • Packages that use IDocSegmentMetaData 
    Package Description
    com.sap.conn.idoc
    Contains the major part of the interfaces, classes and factories that an IDoc processing application is typically dealing with.

    • Uses of IDocSegmentMetaData in com.sap.conn.idoc

      Methods in com.sap.conn.idoc that return IDocSegmentMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegmentMetaData.getChild(int index)
      Returns the child segment meta data object at the specified position in the segment meta data object's child list.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegmentMetaData.getChildByDefinition(String definition)
      Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment definition name.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegmentMetaData.getChildByType(String type)
      Returns the child segment meta data object with the specified segment type.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegmentMetaData.getChildMatchingDefinition(String definition)
      Returns the child segment meta data object that matches with the specified segment definition name.
      IDocSegmentMetaData[] IDocSegmentMetaData.getChildren()
      Returns an array containing all the segment meta data object's child segment meta data objects in the correct order.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegmentMetaData.getParent()
      Returns the segment meta data object's parent segment meta data object.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.getRootSegmentMetaData(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Returns the root segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, and release.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocSegment.getSegmentMetaData()
      Returns the segment's meta data.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.getSegmentMetaData(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Returns the segment meta data for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (segment name).
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.removeRootSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Removes the root segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.removeRootSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease)
      Removes the root segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension and release from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Removes the segment meta data object for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache.
      IDocSegmentMetaData IDocRepository.removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(String iDocType, String iDocTypeExtension, String systemRelease, String applicationRelease, String definition)
      Removes the segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects for the specified IDoc type, extension, release and definition (name) from the local cache.
      Methods in com.sap.conn.idoc with parameters of type IDocSegmentMetaData 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean IDocSegmentMetaData.equalsIgnoreParent(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Checks whether the given segment meta data object is "equal to" this segment meta data object ignoring the parent segment meta data.
      int IDocSegmentMetaData.indexOfChild(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Searches for the first occurrence of the given segment meta data object in the list of child objects, testing for equality using the equals method.
      boolean IDocRepository.removeSegmentMetaDataFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Removes the specified segment meta data object from the local cache.
      boolean IDocRepository.removeSegmentMetaDataTreeFromCache(IDocSegmentMetaData segmentMetaData)
      Removes the specified segment meta data object and all of its child segment meta data objects from the local cache.
